channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. deficit tops $1.8 trillion in 2024 as interest on debt surpasses trillion-dollar mark
item.description: The shortfall was more than 8% from the previous year and the third highest on record, the Treasury Department said Friday.

item.title: BlackRock's ETF chief says 75% of its bitcoin buyers are crypto fans new to Wall Street
item.description: Bitcoin ETF inflows surpass $2.1 billion in a week as bitcoin touches highest price level since July.

item.title: These 3 issues sent a retired couple back to the U.S. after a move to Portugal
You’ll never guess which American president was the best with money
The lucky few Gen Z and millennials who broke into the housing market feel trapped in their starter homes, report says
item.description: Americans feel stuck in their first homes, tied down by high interest rates.

item.title: Spirit Airlines extends debt refinancing deadline hours before expiration
item.description: Spirit Airlines on Friday again extended a deadline with its credit card processor to renegotiate more than $1 billion in debt.

item.title: There’s a new power player at CVS after Karen Lynch’s dismissal—but he’s not CEO
item.description: Roger Farah, who worked behind the scenes to right Ralph Lauren and Tory Burch, will become Executive Chairman at CVS.

item.title: How rookie stars like Caitlin Clark helped grow the WNBA in 2024
Dow, S&P 500 end at new record highs as U.S. stocks extend weekly winning streak
After a well-received quarter, Cramer explains why he thinks Netflix can 'rock on higher'
item.description: NBC's Jim Cramer explained why the quarter made him more optimistic about Netflix's future.

item.title: Italy’s winemakers face yet another threat to their future
item.description: Italy’s winemakers face climate challenges, shifting tastes, and rising debt, threatening the future of this iconic industry.

item.title: 7 in 10 office workers say they have a ‘work wife’ or ‘work husband’—here’s why experts warn they probably shouldn’t
item.description: While the quirky phrase might be shorthand between pals, it's a red flag for everyone else.

item.title: What went wrong at CVS? Departing CEO Karen Lynch’s reign started brilliantly, then unraveled fast
item.description: A trifecta of problems, some that started before she took the top job, ended the reign of one of the most powerful women in American business.

item.title: Trump again refuses to release current health records, as Harris questions his fitness
item.description: Donald Trump would become the oldest person in U.S. history elected president if he beats Kamala Harris in the Nov. 5 election.

item.title: U.S. budget deficit in fiscal 2024 swells to third-highest level on record
